TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WindowsRuntimeBufferExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class WindowsRuntimeBufferExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: Stellt Erweiterungsmethoden für Vorgänge für Windows-Runtime-Puffer (Windows.Storage.Streams.IBuffer-Schnittstelle) bereit.

span.span: Provides extension methods for operating on Windows Runtime buffers (Windows.Storage.Streams.IBuffer interface).
